{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=VIP6102W |fcc_date=06/22/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=set top box |fcc_id=ACQ-VIP6102W |ic_id=109AS-VIP6102W |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM7271 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=eMMC |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=LPDDR4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM7271 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=Bluetooth LE, DFS (slave), IR receiver, HDMI 2.0a, |stock_os=Linux;;Android TV; |802dot11_protocols=an+ac }} {{TagLine|IP, HEVC, Ultra-HD Set-Top Box with 802.11ac Wi-Fi}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/products/vip6102w/}}
May also be branded as ''Telus'' and ''Bell''. :Fast Ethernet is supposedly standard with GbE listed as optional.
{{FCC ST|12/19/2018|indexme.}}
===News=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/09/22/arris-showcased-android-tv-set-top-boxes-at-ibc2017/ ''ARRIS Showcases Android TV Set-Top Boxes at IBC 2017'' on '''CNX-Software'''] <!--(9/22/2017)-->
